text:
;
; LCD_1.asm
;
; Created: 01.02.2018 11:43:51
; Author : xbobekj01
;


; Replace with your application code
.cseg
.org 0

Ini:	ldi		R16,LOW(RAMEND)			;definice zasobniku
		out		SPL,R16
		ldi		R16,HIGH(RAMEND)
		out		SPH,R16

		ldi		R16,0xFF				;nastavi C jako vystup
		out		DDRC,R16

		rcall	LCDini					;inicializace LCD

		ldi		R16,0b10000111			;inicializace analog vstupu - ref nap, 256 hodnot, vstupu ADC2
		out		ADCSRA,R16

		ldi		R16,0b00100101			;inicializace PA5
		out		ADMUX,R16

Start:	sbi		ADCSRA,ADSC				;start prevodu
Cekej:	sbic	ADCSRA,ADSC				;cekani na konec prevodu
		rjmp	Cekej

		rcall	DEL100

		rcall	LCDrow1					;nastaveni kurzoru na 1 radek

		in		R19,ADCH

		ldi		R18,0b00000000

		rcall	LCDrow1					;nastaveni kurzoru na 1 radek
		ldi		ZL,low(2*Text1)			;adresa ve flash
		ldi		ZH,high(2*Text1)
		ldi		R17,6					;pocet znaku
		rcall	LCDstring

		cpi		R19,0x10
		brlo	pryc
		ldi		R18,0b0000011

		rcall	LCDrow1					;nastaveni kurzoru na 1 radek
		ldi		ZL,low(2*Text2)			;adresa ve flash
		ldi		ZH,high(2*Text2)
		ldi		R17,6					;pocet znaku
		rcall	LCDstring

		cpi		R19,0x20
		brlo	pryc
		ldi		R18,0b0000111

		rcall	LCDrow1					;nastaveni kurzoru na 1 radek
		ldi		ZL,low(2*Text3)			;adresa ve flash
		ldi		ZH,high(2*Text3)
		ldi		R17,6					;pocet znaku
		rcall	LCDstring

		cpi		R19,0x30
		brlo	pryc
		ldi		R18,0b0001111

		rcall	LCDrow1					;nastaveni kurzoru na 1 radek
		ldi		ZL,low(2*Text4)			;adresa ve flash
		ldi		ZH,high(2*Text4)
		ldi		R17,6					;pocet znaku
		rcall	LCDstring

			
		cpi		R19,0x40
		brlo	pryc
		ldi		R18,0b0011111

		rcall	LCDrow1					;nastaveni kurzoru na 1 radek
		ldi		ZL,low(2*Text5)			;adresa ve flash
		ldi		ZH,high(2*Text5)
		ldi		R17,6					;pocet znaku
		rcall	LCDstring


		cpi		R19,0x50
		brlo	pryc
		ldi		R18,0b0111111

		rcall	LCDrow1					;nastaveni kurzoru na 1 radek
		ldi		ZL,low(2*Text6)			;adresa ve flash
		ldi		ZH,high(2*Text6)
		ldi		R17,6					;pocet znaku
		rcall	LCDstring


Pryc:	out		PORTC,R18
		rjmp	Start

Text1:	.db		"*     "			;text, musi byt sudy pocet znaku
Text2:	.db		"**    "
Text3:	.db		"***   "
Text4:	.db		"****  "
Text5:	.db		"***** "
Text6:	.db		"******"  

.include "N:\PRS17\delay.inc"			;knihovna pro zpozdeni
.include "N:\PRS17\lcd.inc"				;knihovna pro ovladani LCD
